<h3 id="X14872">X(14872)&nbsp;=&nbsp;SIMPEDAL POINT OF ABC IN EXTOUCH TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b-c)^2*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2+c^2)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(14872) = 2*X(3)-3*X(210) = 4*X(5)-3*X(354) = X(20)-3*X(3681) = 3*X(210)-X(12680) = 3*X(392)-2*X(5882) = 5*X(631)-6*X(3740) = 2*X(942)-3*X(5587) = 2*X(946)-3*X(5927) = X(3555)-3*X(5927) = 3*X(5587)-4*X(9947)</b>
<p>X(14872) lies on these lines: {1,1864}, {2,12675}, {3,210}, {4,518}, {5,354}, {8,6001}, {20,3681}, {30,7957}, {35,5531}, {40,971}, {44,602}, {55,5534}, {56,5720}, {63,11500}, {65,68}, {72,515}, {78,12114}, {84,200}, {90,11508}, {101,947}, {140,12757}, {144,12670}, {153,2894}, {219,1903}, {382,517}, {392,5882}, {480,3358}, {497,5811}, {519,12672}, {631,3740}, {942,5290}, {944,960}, {946,3555}, {952,1898}, {956,6261}, {962,9804}, {999,9850}, {1006,5302}, {1012,3811}, {1155,11499}, {1158,5687}, {1385,5251}, {1456,8757}, {1490,3428}, {1519,3813}, {1532,10916}, {1617,1728}, {1656,13373}, {1698,9940}, {1709,10306}, {1753,12136}, {1765,3694}, {1837,10629}, {1858,5252}, {2182,9798}, {2551,5768}, {2771,12751}, {2800,10914}, {2810,5907}, {3072,4641}, {3073,3744}, {3085,10391}, {3090,3742}, {3091,3873}, {3146,4661}, {3295,5779}, {3338,6918}, {3419,6256}, {3475,6846}, {3576,5044}, {3579,5918}, {3633,13600}, {3678,4297}, {3683,10267}, {3689,11248}, {3697,6684}, {3698,5790}, {3711,7171}, {3715,8273}, {3751,5706}, {3753,5884}, {3812,5818}, {3817,3881}, {3832,4430}, {3848,5067}, {3868,7686}, {3870,11496}, {3876,5731}, {3916,6796}, {3929,10268}, {3953,5400}, {3983,13369}, {4015,10164}, {4326,7160}, {4420,6909}, {4640,11491}, {4662,5657}, {4847,6260}, {4853,7971}, {5045,8227}, {5049,9624}, {5173,9612}, {5227,5776}, {5439,10175}, {5440,5450}, {5562,8679}, {5570,10826}, {5572,5817}, {5686,12669}, {5721,13161}, {5781,7719}, {5794,12115}, {5815,9799}, {6244,12684}, {6282,9954}, {6705,6745}, {6765,12705}, {6766,8001}, {6826,10404}, {6850,12678}, {7080,14647}, {7082,11510}, {7982,9856}, {9037,11412}, {9052,13598}, {9848,9957}, {9956,10202}, {10394,12710}, {10698,11256}, {10827,13750}, {10861,11024}, {11414,12329}, {12608,13257}</p>
<p>
X(14872) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 12528}, {5691, 5904}, {5693, 5881}<br>
X(14872) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 5777), (65, 355), (942, 9947), (944, 960), (3057, 5887), (3555, 946), (3633, 13600), (3868, 7686), (3893, 12645), (4297, 3678), (6282, 9954), (7982, 9856), (9943, 4662), (11827, 12527), (12671, 11500), (12680, 3), (14100, 5779), (14110, 72)<br>
X(14872) = anticomplement of X(12675)<br>
X(14872) = extouch-isogonal conjugate of X(40)<br>
X(14872) = Mandart-circle-inverse-of-X(13528)<br>
X(14872) = {
X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (84, 200, 10310), (210, 12680, 3), (942, 9947, 5587), (1158, 5687, 13528), (3091, 3873, 13374), (3555, 5927, 946), (3697, 10167, 6684), (4662, 9943, 5657), (4882, 7992, 40), (5534, 7330, 55), (6737, 12059, 72), (12528, 12529, 12666)<br>
